Step 1: Load the data from the USGS Water Use site

```{r}
library('data.table')
theURL <- 'http://water.usgs.gov/watuse/data/2010/usco2010.txt'
df = fread(theURL, sep='\t')
df = as.data.frame(df)
class(df)
